## Overview

This project is a modern web application that demonstrates best practices in full-stack development. It features a responsive design, user authentication, and real-time data updates.

## Key Features

- **Responsive Design**: Works seamlessly across all devices
- **User Authentication**: Secure login and registration system
- **Real-time Updates**: Live data synchronization using WebSockets
- **Modern Stack**: Built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB

## Challenges & Solutions

One of the main challenges was implementing real-time updates efficiently. We solved this by using WebSockets for live data synchronization, which significantly improved the user experience.
